Plot: A public-relations agent leaves London for a seemingly idyllic village in the Cotswolds, and soon finds herself a suspect in a murder case involving a poisoned quiche.
Title: Agatha Raisin: The Quiche of Death
Writer: M.C. Beaton (based on the novel "The Quiche of Death" by), Stewart Harcourt
Actors: Ashley Jensen, Oliver Lansley, Mathew Horne, Timothy Renouf
